title: 📘 General Terms of Sale
intro: These general terms apply to any online course order on the Excell-is-Hub App platform. By purchasing a course, you automatically accept these terms.

payment.title: 💳 Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment is made online through secure methods. Once payment is confirmed, the user gains immediate access to the selected course.

delivery.title: 📦 Content Delivery
delivery.content: All content (videos, documents, quizzes, etc.) is delivered digitally and accessible through your personal space.

withdrawal.title: ⏱️ Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.content: According to applicable laws, the right of withdrawal does not apply to digital content consumed immediately after purchase.

support.title: 📩 Support
support.content: If you have trouble accessing a course, please contact us via the contact page. We will respond within 48 business hours.

footer.text: For any questions regarding your purchases or rights, please consult our privacy page or contact us through the contact page.
